languages.text: {n}Губернатор тянет слова, словно он сам не до конца уверен в них или чего-то недоговаривает.{/n}
{n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор тянет слова, словно он сам не до конца уверен в них или чего-то недоговаривает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor is dragging out the words as if he is not entirely sure of them himself or he is not telling you something.{/n}
{n}The governor is dragging out the words as if he is not entirely sure of them himself or he is not telling you something.{/n}

{n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

languages.text: {n}总督有意拖长了声音，似乎他自己也不太确定这些事情，也可能是他在向你隐瞒什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}总督有意拖长了声音，似乎他自己也不太确定这些事情，也可能是他在向你隐瞒什么。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El gobernador arrastra las palabras, como si no estuviese totalmente seguro de lo que habla... o quizá no te lo esté contando todo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador arrastra las palabras, como si no estuviese totalmente seguro de lo que habla... o quizá no te lo esté contando todo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vali, sanki kendisi de tam emin değilmiş ya da senden bir şey saklıyormuş gibi kelimeleri ağzında geveliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, sanki kendisi de tam emin değilmiş ya da senden bir şey saklıyormuş gibi kelimeleri ağzında geveliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総督は、まるで自分でも何をしゃべっているのか分からない。あるいはあなたに何も伝えるつもりがないといった様子で、おしゃべりを長引かせようとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は、まるで自分でも何をしゃべっているのか分からない。あるいはあなたに何も伝えるつもりがないといった様子で、おしゃべりを長引かせようとする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur parle avec lenteur, comme s'il n'était pas tout à fait sûr de lui... ou qu'il vous cachait quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur parle avec lenteur, comme s'il n'était pas tout à fait sûr de lui... ou qu'il vous cachait quelque chose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur zieht seine Worte in die Länge, als wäre er sich ihrer selbst nicht ganz sicher ... oder als würde er dir etwas verschweigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The governor is dragging out his words, as if he is not entirely sure of them himself — or is not telling you something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur zieht seine Worte in die Länge, als wäre er sich ihrer selbst nicht ganz sicher ... oder als würde er dir etwas verschweigen.{/n}
